alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Northern Meade Co Plains; Todd; Tripp; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 12 at 3:48AM MDT until April 14 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MDT /3 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ TONIGHT... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory today, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 2 PM MDT /3 PM CDT/ this afternoon to midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Northern Meade Co Plains; Todd; Tripp; Ziebach
